title: Crisis & Support
subtitle: Quick help, safety plan and local resources.
dangerNow: Are you in immediate danger right now?
havePlan: Do you have a specific plan to hurt yourself?
accessMeans: Do you have access to means (e.g. medications, weapons, height)?
underInfluence: Are you under the influence of alcohol/drugs now?
alone: Are you alone without possibility to get support quickly?
redBanner: Important: Call emergency services now or use a helpline below.
amberBanner: Note: Moderate risk – use safety plan and contact support.
greenBanner: Low risk right now – create/update your plan.
coping: Skills I can do myself (2–3 min)
reasons: What keeps me going / important to me
consent: I consent to the plan being saved locally on the device.
disclaimer: This does not replace emergency healthcare. Seek care when needed.
name: Name
shareNotice: Shareable link contains an anonymous token. Only share with those you trust.
